Test
Direct Known Subclasses:
FilterTestCase, ServletTestCase
public abstract class AbstractWebTestCase
extends AbstractTestCase

Abstract class for Web Test Cases (i.e. HTTP connection to the server) that (ServletTestCase, FilterTestCase, ...) must extend.

Version:
